/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, lined with buildings on both sides, stretches out into the distance, creating a sense of depth and perspective. 

On the right side of the street, modern skyscrapers reach towards the sky, their glass and steel facades reflecting the sunlight. In contrast, the left side of the street is adorned with traditional Chinese architecture, showcasing a blend of old and new. 

The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The image is taken from a low angle, adding to the grandeur of the scene.
